nodes.bodyText:
Actually there is a very subtle difference between these 2.
BaseTest::installApp method will install the app only when the app is not already installed.
This method here will install the app every time even if it's already installed. I had to use it to start with a fresh state so that the changes I make in one method doesn't affect the other method.

nodes.bodyText:
The tests in espresso can run in any order. Meaning testLanguageChanges can run before/after   testAppUpdate_dontInterfereLanguageChanges.
Now, testLanguageChanges assumes that the device language is English to begin with.
And testAppUpdate_dontInterfereLanguageChanges changes the device language to Hindi when it finishes.
So if, testAppUpdate_dontInterfereLanguageChanges runs before testLanguageChanges then testLanguageChanges would fail because "Enter a name:" text would've been changed.
